message: The warehouse is spacious with high ceilings. It's lined with rows of large wooden crates.
The smell of dust is suffocating. Maybe all warehouses are like this, I don't know... but I have to wonder what's being stored here.
Several more men appear from the shadows and gather around us.
Unless I'm mistaken, these are all members of Mink's gang.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you doing here...?"
Mink's men clearly weren't expecting to see me.
They look to Mink for an explanation, but Mink doesn't say a word.
Finally, one of them opens his mouth.

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Mink ordered us here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "He ordered you?"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "All part of Mink's plan. You ain't clued in?"
He has a plan? First I've heard of it.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay, clue me in then. What's this plan?"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "...If you don't know, then what the hell are you doing here?"
One of the men finally loses his patience.

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "I dunno where you came from, but I don't like the look of you."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "You look pretty fucking useless to me. Who the fuck do you think you are?"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "If you think you're gonna get our respect just 'cause you're standing next to Mink, you've got another thing comin'."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Yeah, watch your step, boy."
I'm more dumbfounded than angered by their comments.

name: ミンク
message: "I'm not here to listen to your bitching."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "...Yes, sir."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Sorry..."
Mink's men don't look happy about it, but they shut their mouths.
...They seem to really respect Mink.

You'd never guess from looking at them...

Strange as it may sound, I'm impressed.
Mink looks at me.

name: ミンク
message: "They're here to carry out the plan."
The plan...
...Toue, huh?

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Boss, I hid that thing you asked for. I'll message you the location later."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "We managed to get a lotta weapons in too. Check it out! We're ready to go."
One of the guys takes the bag slung over his shoulder and dumps it out on the floor. Guns of varying sizes clatter across the concrete.
While the Ribsteez swarm them with whoops of joy, Mink picks one up―some kind of machine gun―and looks it over critically.

name: ミンク
message: "Stick to the plan. Contact me if anything changes."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Yes boss! We'll scare the shit outta these rich motherfuckers."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Platinum Jail's a fucking joke. Don't worry. We'll wreck their―"
